pages.title: About Us
pages.body_html:
WTF | Welcome To Florida ‚Äì Premium THC Edibles & Infused Drinks in Florida

WTF | Welcome To Florida is Florida‚Äôs fast-growing destination for premium hemp-derived edibles, THC-infused drinks, kratom alternatives, and functional botanicals ‚Äî all curated with care, tested for quality, and served in a safe, stylish setting.

We‚Äôre not your average smoke shop or kava bar.
We‚Äôre a boutique experience for adults 21+ who want something better.

Looking for the best ‚àÜ9 edibles in Florida? Want to try a THC seltzer or infused lemonade that actually tastes amazing? Interested in a social, relaxing alternative to alcohol? You‚Äôve just found your new favorite place.

At WTF, we carry a hand-picked lineup of:

Delta-9 THC edibles (Farm Bill compliant)

Infused drinks & sodas with functional cannabinoids

Non-alcoholic THC mocktails

Premium kratom beverages

Kava, Kratom, & other botanicals

Rotating draft pours from top botanical brands

Whether you're a first-time user or a seasoned explorer, WTF was built for everyone 21+:

üèñ Tourists visiting Cape Coral or Southwest Florida

üë©üíº Professionals looking for alcohol-free alternatives

üßò‚ôÇÔ∏è Wellness seekers exploring plant-based chill

üßì Boomers and retirees curious about modern cannabis

üëÄ Sober-curious adults wanting something elevated and discreet

üéâ Locals looking for new experiences that actually deliver

No pressure. No smoke clouds. Just premium, tested, legal products ‚Äî in a place that feels fun and familiar.

We source from the top national hemp brands, with only products that are tested for purity and compliance, and are proud to be one of the **first infused beverage bars and edible boutiques in Florida. We don't feel like a vape store. We don't feel like a "head shop". We are "WTF."¬†

We‚Äôre building the future of this counter culture ‚Äî with flavor, with integrity, and without compromise.

Come see us at 1520 SE 46th Ln, Unit B. Cape Coral, FL 33904

¬†

Welcome to WTF | Welcome To Florida, Southwest Florida's destination for premium kava, kratom, and hemp-derived products. Located in the heart of Cape Coral, we serve the entire SWFL community including Fort Myers, Naples, and Bonita Springs.

Premium Kava in Cape Coral, FL

Our fresh-brewed kava is sourced from the finest Pacific Island roots and prepared daily in our Cape Coral location. Experience the traditional relaxation benefits of kava in a modern, welcoming environment.

From kratom drinks to premium leaf varieties, we offer the largest selection of kratom products in the Cape Coral area. All products are lab-tested and compliant with Florida regulations.

Discover our collection of Farm Bill compliant hemp-derived Delta-9 edibles and infused beverages. Perfect for Cape Coral locals and visitors looking for a legal cannabis alternative.

pages.title: FAQ
pages.body_html:
Your Ultimate Guide to Kava, Kratom, and THC Drinks in Southwest Florida

¬†

Welcome to our comprehensive FAQ page, your one-stop resource for information on kava, kratom, and hemp-derived THC drinks in Cape Coral, Fort Myers, and the greater Southwest Florida (SWFL) area. Whether you're a seasoned enthusiast or just curious about botanical beverages, we've got the answers to your most pressing questions.

¬†

General Questions

¬†

What are these alternative beverages? What are "botanical beverages"?

Kava, kratom, and hemp-derived THC drinks are all-natural, non-alcoholic beverages that offer a range of effects, from relaxation and stress relief to mild euphoria and increased focus. They are becoming increasingly popular in Southwest Florida as alternatives to alcohol.

Is it legal to consume these beverages in Florida?

Yes, with some restrictions. Kava is legal throughout Florida. Kratom is legal for adults 21 and over in Florida, with the exception of Sarasota County. Hemp-derived THC products containing less than 0.3% Delta-9 THC by dry weight are also legal in Florida for adults 21 and over.

Where can I find these drinks in Cape Coral and Fort Myers?

You're in luck! Southwest Florida has a growing number of establishments that serve these beverages. In Cape Coral, you can find kava bars and retailers selling kratom and THC drinks. Fort Myers also boasts a variety of kava and kratom bars. WTF | Welcome To Florida sells curated brands & brews their own THC beverages, Kratom Teas, and Kava.

¬†

Kava FAQs

¬†

What is Kava?

Kava, or Piper methysticum, is a plant native to the South Pacific islands. For centuries, its roots have been used to brew a ceremonial drink that promotes relaxation and a sense of well-being. The active compounds in kava, called kavalactones, are responsible for its calming effects.

What does a kava bar do?

A kava bar is a social lounge where you can enjoy traditionally prepared kava drinks in a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere. They offer a non-alcoholic alternative to a typical bar, often with a focus on community and conversation. In SWFL, you'll find places like Kava Culture Kava Bar in both Cape Coral and Fort Myers.

What is the point of drinking kava?

People drink kava for a variety of reasons, including:

  • Reducing stress and anxiety

  • Promoting relaxation and sleep

  • Enhancing sociability and mood

  • As an alternative to alcohol

Does kava make you buzzed?

Kava can produce a mild euphoric and relaxed feeling, often described as a "buzz." However, it is different from an alcohol buzz. It's more of a mental and physical relaxation without the intoxicating effects of alcohol.

Is kava an upper or a downer?

Kava is considered a central nervous system depressant, so it's a "downer." It promotes relaxation and can cause drowsiness in higher doses.

Is a kava bar alcoholic?

No, kava bars are non-alcoholic. They provide a sober and safe environment for people to socialize.

How long does the kava high last?

The effects of kava are typically felt within 20-30 minutes and can last for a few hours, depending on the strength of the drink and individual factors.

¬†

Kratom FAQs

¬†

What is Kratom?

Kratom, or Mitragyna speciosa, is a tropical tree in the coffee family native to Southeast Asia. Its leaves have been used for centuries for their unique properties. At low doses, kratom can be stimulating, while at higher doses, it has more sedative and pain-relieving effects.

Is Kratom legal in Florida?

Yes, kratom is legal for adults aged 21 and over in Florida, with the exception of Sarasota County, where it is banned. The state of Florida has passed the Kratom Consumer Protection Act to regulate the sale and labeling of kratom products.

What are the effects of Kratom?

The effects of kratom vary depending on the strain and dosage. Generally, users report:

  • Increased energy and focus (at low doses)

  • Pain relief

  • Relaxation and sedation (at high doses)

  • Improved mood and a sense of well-being

Where can I find Kratom in Cape Coral and Fort Myers?

You can find kratom products at various locations in SWFL, including kava bars like WTF | Welcome To Florida.

Will Kratom show up on a drug screen?

Standard drug tests do not typically screen for the active compounds in kratom. However, specialized tests can detect it.

¬†

Hemp-Derived THC (Delta-9) FAQs

¬†

What are Hemp-Derived THC Drinks?

Hemp-derived THC drinks are beverages infused with a legally compliant amount of Delta-9 THC. The 2018 Farm Bill legalized hemp products that contain no more than 0.3% Delta-9 THC by dry weight. These drinks offer a mild psychoactive effect, similar to but less potent than marijuana. We still say "start low and go slow" to find your appropriate dose. We have drinks that are excellent for the curious beginner to the seasoned stoner!

Is Hemp-Derived Delta-9 THC legal in Florida?

Yes, hemp-derived Delta-9 THC products are legal in Florida as long as they adhere to the 0.3% THC limit. You must be 21 or older to purchase them.

What are the effects of THC drinks?

THC drinks can produce a range of effects, including:

  • Euphoria and relaxation

  • Altered sensory perception

  • Increased creativity and appetite

  • A "buzzy" or "high" feeling

Where can I buy THC drinks in Cape Coral and Fort Myers?

Several retailers in Southwest Florida now offer THC-infused beverages. In Cape Coral, for example, WTF | Welcome To Florida is your go-to for a curated selection. The more you buy, the more you save!

How are THC drinks different from marijuana?

The main difference is the source and concentration of THC. Hemp-derived THC drinks contain a much lower concentration of THC than marijuana products and are legal under the 2018 Farm Bill. Marijuana-derived THC is only legal in Florida for medical patients as of this writing in 2025.

To get even more answers to your frequently asked questions, feel free to come in to our brick & mortar location at 1520 SE 46th Ln Unit B, Cape Coral, FL 33904. We are happy to help you pick your new favorite self-care beverages and treats!¬†

Our Story

Founded in 2022, WTF (Welcome To Florida) began with a simple mission: harness Florida's unique climate and soil to grow exceptional botanicals for wellness enthusiasts.

Our team of agricultural experts and wellness specialists work together to create premium plant-based products that showcase the best of what Florida has to offer.

From our farms to your doorstep, we maintain complete control over quality, using sustainable practices and rigorous testing to ensure purity and potency.

{% comment %} Educational Section - Compliant information about botanicals {% endcomment %}

Learn About Florida's Botanicals

Hemp
Tropical Herbs
Plant Wellness

The History of Hemp

Hemp has been cultivated for thousands of years as one of humanity's oldest agricultural crops. This versatile plant has been used historically for fiber, textiles, paper, and wellness applications.

In Florida, our unique climate creates ideal growing conditions for this remarkable plant. Our hemp is farmed using sustainable practices, ensuring we produce the highest quality extracts.

The Endocannabinoid System

The human body contains a complex cell-signaling system called the endocannabinoid system (ECS). This system plays a role in regulating sleep, mood, appetite, and other functions. Plant compounds can interact with this system in beneficial ways.

{% comment %} FAQ Section {% endcomment %}

Frequently Asked Questions

Are your products legal?

Yes, all WTF products comply with federal and Florida state regulations. Our hemp-derived products contain less than 0.3% THC, as required by law. Our herbal products are made with traditional botanicals that are legal for sale.

How do you ensure quality?

We control every step of the process - from cultivation to extraction to packaging. All products undergo third-party laboratory testing for purity and potency, with results available on our website.

Do you ship nationwide?

Yes, we ship to all 50 states where our products are legal. International shipping is available for select countries.

What makes Florida botanicals special?

Florida's unique combination of sunshine, rainfall, and soil composition creates ideal growing conditions for our plants. This environment produces botanicals with exceptional quality and beneficial compound profiles.

{% comment %} Testimonials - Compliant customer feedback {% endcomment %}

What Our Customers Say

"I've tried many brands, but WTF's quality is simply outstanding. Their commitment to sustainable farming practices and rigorous testing shows in every product."

- Michael R., Verified Customer

pages.title: Our Story
pages.body_html:
WTF | Welcome To Florida: Premium. Curated. Florida AF.

I'm Brendan ‚Äî entrepreneur, innovator, and a lifelong believer in doing things my own way. I come from two worlds: one of structure and accountability, and another of creativity and counterculture.

In one world, I've spent over a decade working within systems where every move has consequences. Where every decision, every signature is tied to trust, accountability, and following through on promises. This taught me discipline and showed me the power of your word. When I say I'll deliver something, you can count on it happening.

And in the other world? I'm driven by creativity, curiosity, and challenging conventions. By asking: what's next? What can I make better? What's nobody else doing yet?

That's what led me to create WTF | Welcome To Florida ‚Äî a boutique that reimagines what a premium alcohol-free, botanical experience can be. I wasn't trying to fit into existing industries. I wanted to transform them completely.

At WTF, we're not just selling products. We're curating an experience. We're taking the highest-quality, most innovative cannabinoid products in the country and bringing them to Southwest Florida. We're building a space that feels fun, accessible, and premium ‚Äî a spot where anyone can explore without stigma, without pressure, without the outdated approach of the traditional market.

I didn't start WTF to follow the crowd. I started it to chart a new path. To make something more welcoming, transparent, and engaging. To create a space where counterculture attitude meets unparalleled quality. Where the pioneering spirit shows up in every product and every decision we make.

I'm staking my rep on supplying only the best cannabinoid products that meet the highest standards ‚Äî the kind of quality you'd expect from regulated dispensaries, but with the creative freedom to innovate beyond conventional limitations. We're not competing with others; we're creating something entirely new.

Welcome To Florida. Welcome to WTF.

#WTF #WTFlorida #WelcomeToFlorida #CapeCoral #FortMyers #FunctionalCannabinoids #THCLemonade #THCSeltzer #THCDrinks #PremiumEdibles #KavaBar #Relax #KavaCommunity #Kratom #CannabisMocktail #CoffeeTime #Espresso #ColdBrew #KratomTeas #KTeas #PremiumEdibles #PlantBased #KratomSavesLives #KratomCommunity #MitragynaSpeciosa #THC #SoberCurious #MindfulBuzz #CleanChillCannabis #PlantBasedVibes #ChillWithoutAlcohol #PlantMedicine #Wellness #SupportLocal #ShopLocal #WTFlorida #WelcomeToFlorida #GoodVibesOnly #Relaxation #StressRelief #NaturalWellness #HerbalRemedies #PlantBased

pages.title: WTF is a Kava Bar? Florida's Ultimate Guide to Kava, Kratom, & THC Drinks
pages.body_html:
Florida's different. It's a vibe‚Äîa mix of sunshine, strange headlines, and a relentless search for a better way to chill. So, why is your social life still stuck on the old-school bar scene? The loud music, the sticky floors, the inevitable next-day regret... it's time for an upgrade.

Welcome To Florida. Welcome to the future of your night out.

A kava bar is the evolution of the watering hole. It's a social space built around plant-based drinks that actually make you feel good. Think of it as a bar where the "buzz" is better, the conversations are deeper, and the mornings are brighter. At WTF, we've perfected the Florida version: laid-back, knowledgeable, and a little bit wild.

The WTF Menu: A Field Guide to Plant-Powered Drinks

Forget wells drinks and cheap beer. Our menu is a curated collection of the world's most interesting botanicals, served up right here in Cape Coral. Here's what you'll find on tap.

Kava: Florida's Answer to Stress

What it is: The star of the show. Kava is a drink made from the root of a plant grown in the Pacific Islands. For centuries, people have used it to relax, connect, and celebrate. We prepare it fresh, ensuring you get the authentic, potent experience.

The Vibe: Kava delivers a calm, happy, and social feeling. It melts away the stress of the day without clouding your mind. We call it the "social lubricant for the soul." You'll hear us yell "Bula!" before drinking‚Äîit's like saying "Cheers!" and means "life."

Kratom Tea: Find Your Perfect Energy

What it is: A tea brewed from the leaves of a Southeast Asian tree. Kratom is known for its versatile effects, which change based on the strain.

The Vibe: Need to focus up for a project? Grab a White strain. Looking to socialize and feel great? Go for a Green. Ready to wind down after a long day? A Red strain is your ticket. It's the ultimate functional beverage, tailored to your needs.

THC Drinks: The Legal Buzz You're Looking For

What it is: Welcome to the new frontier. Thanks to the 2018 Farm Bill, we can offer a range of amazing, hemp-derived THC products. We're talking seltzers, cocktails, and shots featuring Delta-8 and Delta-9 THC that are fully legal in Florida.

The Vibe: Enjoy the classic, euphoric, and relaxing buzz of cannabis in a perfectly dosed and delicious drink. It's a clean, smoke-free way to elevate your state of mind. This is the future of cannabis consumption, and it's right here at WTF.

Botanical Beverages & Elixirs: Handcrafted for a Florida State of Mind

What it is: This is where our mixologists get creative. Our botanical elixirs are non-alcoholic masterpieces, crafted with a potent mix of adaptogens, nootropics, and exotic herbs to create a specific feeling‚Äîbe it focus, bliss, or pure energy.

The Vibe: These are the drinks for the adventurers. The ones who want to try something new that tastes incredible and delivers a tangible effect. You won't find these concoctions anywhere else.

The Vibe: It's Not a Bar, It's a Florida Community

At WTF, it's not just about what's in your cup‚Äîit's about who you're sharing it with. The vibe is "come as you are." We're a hub for the artists, the entrepreneurs, the boat captains, the students, the weirdos, and the wonderful. It's a place built for real conversation and genuine connection, minus the pressure and noise of a typical bar.

Whether you're working on your laptop, meeting new people, or just chilling out, you've found your spot.

Why WTF is Better Than a Basic Bar

Let's break it down. Why should you make a kava bar your new go-to?

  • No Hangovers. Ever. Enjoy a social buzz and wake up feeling 100%.
  • Real Connection. Our drinks facilitate conversation, they don't drown it out.
  • Healthier Choice. You're putting powerful plants in your body, not poison.
  • Find Your Vibe. With our diverse menu, you can choose exactly how you want to feel.

pages.title: WTF | Welcome To Florida - Cape Coral's Premier Kava Bar & Wellness Destination
pages.body_html:
WTF | Welcome To Florida

Cape Coral's Most Unique Kava & Wellness Destination

What The Florida is this amazing place?! We're your neighborhood kava bar serving premium kava, kratom, hemp products, and good vibes in the heart of Cape Coral. Come discover why we're Southwest Florida's favorite!

üõçÔ∏è Shop All Products üìû Call (239) 955-0314 üó∫Ô∏è Visit Us Today

What The Florida Makes Us Special?

We're not your typical corporate kava chain. We're Cape Coral natives serving our community with authentic Florida hospitality and premium products.

üè†

Cape Coral Born & Raised

We're not some corporate chain - we're your neighbors! Born and raised in Cape Coral, we understand our community and serve it with authentic Florida pride.

pages.body_html:
Are you 21 or older?

Premium Florida-Grown Hemp and Botanical Products | WTF

Welcome To Florida: Premium natural wellness with hemp extracts, herbal beverages & more

About Our Hemp Products

At WTF (Welcome To Florida), we offer premium hemp-derived products, including full-spectrum extracts, edibles, and infused beverages. All our hemp products contain less than 0.3% Delta-9 THC, making them compliant with federal regulations.

Legal Disclaimer: Our products contain less than 0.3% Delta-9 THC on a dry weight basis, in compliance with the 2018 Farm Bill. These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Hemp Tinctures

Our premium hemp oil tinctures are made with organic MCT oil and full-spectrum hemp extract. Available in multiple concentrations to suit your needs.

View Hemp Tinctures

Hemp Gummies

Delicious fruit-flavored gummies infused with our premium hemp extract. A convenient and tasty way to incorporate hemp into your wellness routine.

View Hemp Gummies

Botanical Beverages

Refreshing drinks crafted with natural flavors and our signature botanical blends, including hemp extracts and other natural ingredients.

View Botanical Beverages

Understanding Hemp and Its Benefits

Hemp is a versatile plant that has been used for thousands of years for various purposes. Modern research continues to explore the potential benefits of hemp-derived compounds and how they interact with the body's systems.

The Endocannabinoid System

The endocannabinoid system (ECS) is a complex cell-signaling system in the human body that regulates various functions including sleep, mood, appetite, and memory. Hemp-derived compounds can interact with this system.

Learn More About the ECS

Full-Spectrum vs. Isolate

Full-spectrum hemp extracts contain all the naturally occurring compounds found in the hemp plant, while isolates contain only single compounds. Many users prefer full-spectrum for the "entourage effect."

Understanding Hemp Extracts

Frequently Asked Questions

Are your products legal?

Yes, all our hemp products comply with the 2018 Farm Bill and contain less than 0.3% Delta-9 THC on a dry weight basis. However, regulations vary by state, so please check your local laws before purchasing.

Will your products cause intoxication?

Our hemp products contain less than 0.3% Delta-9 THC, which is not enough to cause significant intoxication. However, individual responses may vary, and we recommend starting with a small amount to assess your personal reaction.

How do I use your products?

Usage instructions vary by product. Tinctures are typically placed under the tongue, gummies are eaten, and beverages are consumed like any drink. Detailed instructions can be found on product packaging and product pages.

Do you ship to all states?

We currently ship to most U.S. states where hemp products are legal. Check our shipping policy for details on specific states.

Shop Premium Florida Hemp Products

Discover our collection of high-quality hemp extracts and botanical wellness products.

Shop Now Learn More About WTF

About Our Products

At WTF, we specialize in premium quality botanicals sourced from Florida farms. Our products are crafted from natural ingredients, carefully selected and processed to preserve their beneficial properties.

Our Process

We use a specialized extraction method that preserves the natural compounds found in our botanicals. This ensures you get the full spectrum of benefits.

Quality Testing

pages.title: Your privacy choices
pages.body_html:
As described in our Privacy Policy, we collect personal information from your interactions with us and our website, including through cookies and similar technologies. We may also share this personal information with third parties, including advertising partners. We do this in order to show you ads on other websites that are more relevant to your interests and for other reasons outlined in our privacy policy.

Sharing of personal information for targeted advertising based on your interaction on different websites may be considered "sales", "sharing", or "targeted advertising" under certain U.S. state privacy laws. Depending on where you live, you may have the right to opt out of these activities. If you would like to exercise this opt-out right, please follow the instructions below.

If you visit our website with the Global Privacy Control opt-out preference signal enabled, depending on where you are, we will treat this as a request to opt-out of activity that may be considered a ‚Äúsale‚Äù or ‚Äúsharing‚Äù of personal information or other uses that may be considered targeted advertising for the device and browser you used to visit our website.
